title: Find the Perfect Menu for Every Event
subTitle: Weddings, birthdays, corporate events - we will help you choose the best place for your event.
chefWorking: The chef is working on it… menu will be ready soon!
comingSoonMessage: Meanwhile, you can <0>go back home</0> or <1>explore other restaurants</1>.
eventDescription: At SetMenu, we believe every event deserves amazing food. Born from a love of cuisine and celebration, we help you find the ideal menu — no matter the occasion. Our platform connects you with curated dishes, trusted local restaurants, and inspiration to make your event truly special.

eventHeadlines.wedding: Plan the Wedding Feast of Your Dreams
eventHeadlines.birthday: Celebrate Your Birthday at the Perfect Restaurant
eventHeadlines.corporate: Host Your Corporate Event with Elegance
eventHeadlines.holiday-parties: Book the Perfect Spot for Your Holiday Party
eventHeadlines.casual-gatherings: Enjoy Great Food with Great People
eventHeadlines.kids: Fun Menus for the Little Guests

noRestaurantsSubtitle: Try adjusting your filters or search term.

howSteps.discoverDescription: Browse top-rated venues perfect for any occasion — birthdays, weddings, corporate events, and more.
howSteps.selectDescription: Pick your event type, date, and number of guests to see tailored recommendations.
howSteps.exploreDescription: View curated menus, pricing, and unique dishes offered by each restaurant.
howSteps.setDescription: Customize your menu and reserve your event directly through SetMenu.
howSteps.enjoyDescription: Relax and enjoy a seamless dining experience for you and your guests.
